metadata.name: UNIMUSEUM 1 YEAR!
metadata.description:
UNIMUSEUM is thrilled to celebrate its one-year anniversary! It has been a whole year since we opened our very first Metaverse exhibition on Mozilla Hubs. Our incredible Open Hearts exhibition, which features the stunning works of 13 talented Ukrainian artists, is still open for visits. You can check it out at https://hubs.mozilla.com/yyVo56m/unimuseum-ua

Let's take a moment to reflect on the remarkable year we had in 2022. UNIMUSEUM proudly participated in the NFT Biennial with the Ukrainian pavilion named FREEDOM HOUSE. This virtual exhibition took place at https://www.spatial.io/s/NFT-BIENNIAL-UKRAINIAN-PAVILION-63b86a8d85d2f42de20b01ca?share=6687915245983330843

Our latest global project, the WORLD FOR PEACE exhibition, is an absolute must-see! It features artworks by 43 talented artists from 26 different countries. You can explore this immersive exhibition at https://www.spatial.io/s/IMD2023-WORLD-FOR-PEACE-646603edf1caf0962f0a2dfa?share=3788503000175786012

Come on over and join us as we celebrate our one-year milestone. Immerse yourself in the captivating art displayed in our virtual museum. We can't wait to share this experience with you!
